description: *** Install with Chocolatey! (cinst wolfpack) *** Wolfpack is an extensible .Net windows service based framework for running jobs to monitor your software and system. The data collected can be sent directly to Growl clients, REST and Databases and it exposes a native Geckoboard REST/JSON data feed so you create instant dashboards for your system. It comes preloaded with some tasks but it's simple to implement your own!
summary: This package contains the entire Wolfpack runtime and should ideally be installed with chocolatey (cinst wolfpack)
author: jimbobdog
